function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High percentage of respondents in disagreement about construction firms determining ideal projects actively pursuing","Impact":"Misalignment in project pursuit leading to inefficiency and resource wastage","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough market research and stakeholder consultations to determine ideal projects","Technologies":"Market research tools, stakeholder engagement platforms","People":"Construction firms, project managers, stakeholders","Owner":"Market research analysts, project managers, construction firm leadership"},{"Description":"Large percentage of respondents in disagreement about construction companies adjusting schedule to avoid slowdown bottleneck","Impact":"Potential project delays, cost overruns, and resource misallocation","Mitigation":"Implementing robust project scheduling and monitoring systems, conducting regular bottleneck analysis","Technologies":"Project management software, bottleneck analysis tools","People":"Construction companies, project managers, scheduling teams","Owner":"Project managers, scheduling teams, construction firm leadership"},{"Description":"Significant number of respondents in disagreement about construction companies improving office productivity and lowering overhead costs","Impact":"Reduced productivity, increased overhead costs, and inefficiency in operations","Mitigation":"Implementing lean management practices, automation of repetitive tasks, and cost-saving measures","Technologies":"Lean management tools, automation software, cost-saving analytics tools","People":"Construction company management, office managers, employees","Owner":"Management teams, office managers, process improvement specialists"}]}
